BRC Global Standard

Brand Reputation through Compliance

What is BRC?

The BRC Global Standard for Food Safety is one of the leading global food safety standards, used by over 25,000 certificated suppliers in 130 countries. It provides a framework to manage product safety, integrity, legality, and quality, while also offering protection for the consumer.

Established in 1998 by major UK retailers, BRC has become a benchmark for food safety and quality management systems worldwide. The standard is recognized by the Global Food Safety Initiative (GFSI) and is essential for companies supplying major retailers and food service organizations.

Why BRC Matters to Shehirian

At Shehirian, we take immense pride in our BRC certification. It demonstrates our unwavering commitment to:

  • Food Safety Excellence: Comprehensive hazard analysis and critical control points (HACCP) implementation throughout our production process
  • Quality Management: Rigorous quality control systems ensuring every batch of bulgur wheat meets the highest standards
  • Operational Standards: Best practices in manufacturing, hygiene, and personnel management
  • Traceability: Complete tracking from raw materials to finished products, ensuring full transparency
  • Customer Confidence: Peace of mind for our partners and consumers worldwide

Our BRC Journey

Since 1958, Shehirian has been producing premium bulgur wheat using traditional methods passed down through generations. Our BRC certification represents the perfect marriage of time-honored craftsmanship and modern food safety standards.

We undergo annual audits to maintain our certification, continuously improving our processes and staying at the forefront of food safety innovation. This commitment ensures that our bulgur wheat not only honors our Armenian heritage but also meets the stringent requirements of today's global marketplace.

What BRC Certification Covers

  • Senior management commitment and continual improvement
  • Hazard and risk assessment (HACCP principles)
  • Food safety and quality management systems
  • Site standards (facility design, maintenance, and cleanliness)
  • Product control (design, development, labeling, and packaging)
  • Process control (operational procedures and manufacturing practices)
  • Personnel training, hygiene, and welfare

The Shehirian Difference

Our BRC certification is more than a badge—it's a promise. When you choose Shehirian bulgur wheat, you're choosing a product that has been produced under some of the most stringent food safety standards in the world, while maintaining the authentic taste and quality our family has perfected over 65+ years.
